title: The Everglades
description: It's 1962 and the Mafia has discovered some new tricks in getting their drugs from Columbia to the streets of America. Their plans are working perfectly until an unfortunate boating accident puts the FBI back on their trail. Carson's friend, Elizabeth Teague, has a large amount of cash hidden in her luggage and this cash belongs to the Mafia. They want it back. Protecting his friend and sorting through the details, Carson finds himself in the middle of a conspiracy that has roots in Humboldt. He also finds a murder with too many suspects. From the Everglades, to Puerto Rico, to Memphis, to Humboldt - join Carson as he tries to separate the good guys from the bad guys in 'the Everglades'.
author: Gerald W. Darnell
